meanings.definition: A species of great apes native to Africa, closely related to humans.
meanings.sent1: Chimpanzees are intelligent animals that live in the forests.
meanings.sent2: We saw a group of chimpanzees swinging from tree to tree in the jungle.
meanings.sent3: The chimpanzees decided to have a picnic in the forest.
meanings.sent4: Her classroom was full of energetic chimpanzees eager to learn.
meanings.sent5: The researcher observed the chimpanzees communicating using sign language.

meanings.sent1: The zookeeper fed the chimpanzees their favorite fruits.
meanings.sent2: Chimpanzees are fascinating creatures to observe in their natural habitat.
meanings.sent3: The chimpanzees organized a talent show to entertain the visitors.
meanings.sent4: The room was filled with laughter as the chimpanzees played games together.
meanings.sent5: The artist painted a beautiful mural depicting a family of chimpanzees.
